00085     def __init__(
00086         self, 
00087         name=None,
00088         cursorVisible=True,
00089         cursorRows=1,
00090         cursorCols=1,
00091         cursorHotCol=0,
00092         cursorHotRow=0,
00093         iconNormal=None,
00094         iconHilite=None,
00095         iconX=0,
00096         iconY=0,
00097         scrollMargin=0,
00098         **args):
00099 
00100         self.name = name
00101         self.cursorVisible = cursorVisible
00102         self.cursorRows = cursorRows
00103         self.cursorCols = cursorCols
00104         self.cursorHotCol = cursorHotCol
00105         self.cursorHotRow = cursorHotRow
00106         self.iconNormal = iconNormal
00107         self.iconHilite = iconHilite
00108         self.iconX = iconX
00109         self.iconY = iconY
00110         self.scrollMargin = scrollMargin
00111 
00112         if name:
00113             TileTool.allTools[name] = self

00138     def getCursorHotSpot(
00139         self,
00140         view):
00141 
00142         tileSize = view.tileSize
00143 
00144         return (
00145             (view.cursorCol + self.cursorHotCol + 0.5) * tileSize,
00146             (view.cursorRow + self.cursorHotRow + 0.5) * tileSize,
00147         )
00148 
00149 
00150     def drawCursor(
00151         self, 
00152         view,
00153         ctx):
00154 
00155         if not self.cursorVisible:
00156             return
00157 
00158         cursorX = view.cursorX
00159         cursorY = view.cursorY
00160         cursorCol = view.cursorCol
00161         cursorRow = view.cursorRow
00162         cursorCols = self.cursorCols
00163         cursorRows = self.cursorRows
00164         tileSize = view.tileSize
00165         panX = view.panX
00166         panY = view.panY
00167 
00168         x = panX + (tileSize * cursorCol)
00169         y = panY + (tileSize * cursorRow)
00170 
00171         #print "drawCursor", "cursor", cursorCol, cursorRow, cursorCols, cursorRow, "size", tileSize, "pan", panX, panY, "tile", x, y
00172 
00173         ctx.save()
00174 
00175         ctx.translate(
00176             x,
00177             y)
00178 
00179         ctx.rectangle(
00180             -2,
00181             -2,
00182             (cursorCols * tileSize) + 4,
00183             (cursorRows * tileSize) + 4)
00184 
00185         ctx.set_line_width(
00186             4.0)
00187 
00188         ctx.set_source_rgb(
00189             1.0,
00190             1.0,
00191             1.0)
00192 
00193         ctx.stroke_preserve()
00194 
00195         ctx.set_line_width(
00196             2.0)
00197 
00198         ctx.set_source_rgb(
00199             0.0,
00200             0.0,
00201             0.0)
00202 
00203         ctx.stroke()
00204 
00205         ctx.restore()
00206 
00207 
00208     def setCursorPos(
00209         self,
00210         view,
00211         x,
00212         y,
00213         forceRedraw=False):
00214 
00215         tileSize = view.tileSize
00216         col = int(math.floor(x / tileSize)) - self.cursorHotCol
00217         row = int(math.floor(y / tileSize)) - self.cursorHotRow
00218 
00219         cursorRows = self.cursorRows
00220         cursorCols = self.cursorCols
00221         col = max(0, min(view.worldCols - cursorCols, col))
00222         row = max(0, min(view.worldRows - cursorRows, row))
00223 
00224         if cursorCols:
00225             cursorXChanged = view.cursorCol != col
00226         else:
00227             cursorXChanged = view.cursorX != x
00228         if cursorRows:
00229             cursorYChanged = view.cursorRow != row
00230         else:
00231             cursorYChanged = view.cursorY != y
00232 
00233         view.cursorX = x
00234         view.cursorY = y
00235 
00236         if (forceRedraw or
00237             cursorXChanged or
00238             cursorYChanged):
00239             view.cursorCol = col
00240             view.cursorRow = row
00241             view.cursorMoved()
00242 
00243 
00244     def moveCursor(
00245         self,
00246         view,
00247         dx,
00248         dy):
00249         
00250         col = view.cursorCol + dx
00251         row = view.cursorRow + dy
00252 
00253         tileSize = view.tileSize
00254         tileMiddle = int(math.floor((tileSize / 2.0) + 0.5))
00255         cursorCols = self.cursorCols
00256         cursorRows = self.cursorRows
00257         worldCols = view.worldCols
00258         worldRows = view.worldRows
00259 
00260         if col < 0:
00261             col = 0
00262         if col > (worldCols - cursorCols):
00263             col =  (worldCols - cursorCols)
00264 
00265         if row < 0:
00266             row = 0
00267         if row > (worldRows - cursorRows):
00268             row = (worldRows - cursorRows)
00269 
00270         x = ((col + self.cursorHotCol) * tileSize) + tileMiddle
00271         y = ((row + self.cursorHotRow) * tileSize) + tileMiddle
00272 
00273         self.setCursorPos(
00274             view,
00275             x,
00276             y)
00277 
00278         self.revealCursor(
00279             view)
00280 
00281 
00282     def revealCursor(
00283         self,
00284         view):
00285         
00286         rect = view.get_allocation()
00287         winWidth = rect.width
00288         winHeight = rect.height
00289 
00290         cursorCol = view.cursorCol
00291         cursorRow = view.cursorRow
00292         cursorCols = self.cursorCols
00293         cursorRows = self.cursorRows
00294         tileSize = view.tileSize
00295         panX = view.panX
00296         panY = view.panY
00297 
00298         left = panX + (tileSize * cursorCol)
00299         right = left + (max(1, cursorCols) * tileSize)
00300         top = panY + (tileSize * cursorRow)
00301         bottom = top + (max(1, cursorRows) * tileSize)
00302 
00303         dx = 0
00304         dy = 0
00305 
00306         scrollMargin = max(
00307             0,
00308             min(
00309                 self.scrollMargin,
00310                 int(winWidth / 3),
00311                 int(winHeight / 3)))
00312 
00313         left -= scrollMargin
00314         right += scrollMargin
00315         top -= scrollMargin
00316         bottom += scrollMargin
00317 
00318         if right >= winWidth:
00319             dx = winWidth - right
00320         elif left < 0:
00321             dx = -left
00322 
00323         if bottom >= winHeight:
00324             dy = winHeight - bottom
00325         elif top < 0:
00326             dy = -top
00327 
00328         if (dx or dy):
00329             #print "Panning", dx, dy
00330             view.panBy(dx, dy)
00331 
00332 
00333     # Return True if handled.
00334     def handleKeyDown(self, view, event):
00335 
00336         key = event.keyval
00337 
00338         if key == 65362: # left arrow
00339             self.moveCursor(view, 0, -1)
00340             return True
00341         elif key == 65364: # right arrow
00342             self.moveCursor(view, 0, 1)
00343             return True
00344         elif key == 65361: # up arrow
00345             self.moveCursor(view, -1, 0)
00346             return True
00347         elif key == 65363: # down arrow
00348             self.moveCursor(view, 1, 0)
00349             return True
00350 
00351         return False
00352

00363 
00364         return False

00396 class PanTool(TileTool):
00397 
00398 
00399     def __init__(
00400         self, 
00401         **args):
00402 
00403         TileTool.__init__(
00404             self,
00405             **args)
00406 
00407         self.startMouseX = 0
00408         self.startMouseY = 0
00409         self.startPanX = 0
00410         self.startPanY = 0
00411         self.autoScrollBorder = 20
00412         self.autoScrollStep = 10
00413 
00414 
00415     def startPanning(
00416         self,
00417         view):
00418 
00419         self.startMouseX = view.mouseX
00420         self.startMouseY = view.mouseY
00421         self.startPanX = view.panX
00422         self.startPanY = view.panY
00423 
00424 
00425     def handlePan(
00426         self,
00427         view):
00428 
00429         #print "PanTool handlePan", self, view
00430 
00431         x = view.mouseX
00432         y = view.mouseY
00433 
00434         #print "PANNING"
00435         dx = x - self.startMouseX
00436         dy = y - self.startMouseY
00437         panX = self.startPanX + dx
00438         panY = self.startPanY + dy
00439         if ((panX != view.panX) or
00440             (panY != view.panY)):
00441             view.panX = panX
00442             view.panY = panY
00443             view.queue_draw()
00444 
00445 
00446     def handleMousePoint(
00447         self, 
00448         view, 
00449         event):
00450 
00451         self.handlePan(
00452             view)
00453

00469         self.handleMousePoint(
00470             view,

00487     def handleKeyUp(self, view, event):
00488 
00489         key = event.keyval
00490         #print "PanTool handleKeyRelease", key, view.trackingToolTrigger
00491         if key == view.trackingToolTrigger:
00492             view.trackingTool = None
00493 
00494 
00495     def tick(
00496         self, 
00497         view):
00498 
00499         xDirection, yDirection = \
00500             self.getAutoScrollDirections(
00501                 view)
00502 
00503         if xDirection or yDirection:
00504             self.doAutoScroll(
00505                 view,
00506                 xDirection, 
00507                 yDirection)
00508 
00509 
00510     def getAutoScrollDirections(
00511         self,
00512         view):
00513 
00514         winRect = view.get_allocation()
00515         winWidth = winRect.width
00516         winHeight = winRect.height
00517 
00518         x = view.mouseX
00519         y = view.mouseY
00520 
00521         border = self.autoScrollBorder
00522 
00523         if x < border:
00524             xDirection = -1
00525         elif x >= (winWidth - border):
00526             xDirection = 1
00527         else:
00528             xDirection = 0
00529 
00530         if y < border:
00531             yDirection = -1
00532         elif y >= (winHeight - border):
00533             yDirection = 1
00534         else:
00535             yDirection = 0
00536 
00537         return (
00538             xDirection,
00539             yDirection)
00540 
00541 
00542     def doAutoScroll(
00543         self,
00544         view,
00545         dx,
00546         dy):
00547 
00548         # TODO: Make the autoscroll speed be based on the elapsed time
00549 
00550         #print "doAutoScroll", dx, dy
00551 
00552         step = self.autoScrollStep
00553 
00554         self.startMouseX -= dx * step
00555         self.startMouseY -= dy * step
00556 
00557         self.handlePan(view)
00558         view.updateCursorPosition(None)
00559

00562         self, 
00563         view,
00564         ctx):
00565 
00566         pass
